text: Black Dog is a 1998 action thriller movie. Patrick Swayze plays Jack Crews, Brenda Strong plays Melanie Crews. Randy Travis plays Earl. The movie is about a trucker who at first refuses a job, but then learns that his house will be repossessed unless he pays his debt. This movie was rated PG-13 when it was released in the United States in May 1998. It earned back more than USD$12 million in the box office. Rotten Tomatoes gave Black Dog an 11% rating, meaning it is very bad. ==References== Category:1998 drama movies Category:1998 action movies Category:1998 thriller movies Category:1990s drama thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:English- language movies Category:Trucker movies
title: Black Dog
